entry.title: France's Macron Lost Grip on Parliament Amid Russian Energy Squeeze
entry.content: Election defeat is early sign of higher stakes for European leaders as fighting in Ukraine becomes war of attrition.

entry.title: Russia Strikes Ukrainian Positions, Residential Areas in Donbas
entry.content: Russian forces launched airstrikes and artillery attacks as they pressed their offensive in eastern Ukraine, and explosions also rocked the southern port city of Odessa.

entry.title: Brazilian Police Probe Illegal Fishermen Over Amazon Double Homicide
entry.content: Gunmen targeted indigenous expert Bruno Pereira, investigators said, and then turned weapon on British journalist Dom Phillips, likely to silence him.

entry.title: Heat Wave Devastates India's Mango Harvest
entry.content: Record temperatures have wreaked havoc on crops, threatening the livelihoods of farmers and elevating food prices for the countryâ€™s nearly 1.4 billion people.
